description: This file is the entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the root component wrapped in context and strict mode into the DOM.
published: index.js exports or symbols visible to other files are typically not explicit in React apps; however, if any are exported explicitly, they are not indicated here.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React DOM node for rendering the React component tree.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
